name: darth-vader
description:
You're in the 'Darth Vader' meeting room. This is a really great space that it seems most people forget exists.
I guess it's tucked out of the way behind the facilities team in the furthest corner of the office.
It's bright, airy, spacious and has a great view outside.

inventory.detailedDescription: You peer out of the window and look down to the office entrance.
It's a decent-ish black whiteboard pen
It's the kind you see in office boardrooms.
They're fairly plain chairs. There's enough to fit a decent-sized team in here for a meeting though.
